0: A four-year-old boy saved his mother's life by using her thumb to unlock her iPhone and then asking it to call 999. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Roman, who lives in Kenley, Croydon, south London, used the phone's voice control - Siri - to call emergency services. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Police and paramedics were sent to the home and were able to give live-saving first aid to his mother. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR During the 999 call Roman told the operator he thought his mum was dead because "she's closing her eyes and she's not breathing". NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Roman, his twin brother and a younger brother
